results.title: Circulating GDF15 concentrations in girls with low birth weight: effects of prolonged metformin treatment.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Circulating @GENE_GDF15 @GENE_9518 @@@GDF15@@@ concentrations increased significantly in @DISEASE_Birth_Weight @DISEASE_MESH:D001724 @@@LBW@@@-@<m>DISEASE_Hyperlexia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565500 @@@PP@@@ girls only after 3 and 4 years on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Díaz M, Carreras-Badosa G, Villarroya J, Gavaldà-Navarro A, Bassols J, de Zegher F, López-Bermejo A, Villarroya F, Ibáñez L. Circulating GDF15 concentrations in girls with low birth weight: effects of prolonged metformin treatment. Pediatr Res. 2022 Jul 11;():. PMID: 35817957

results.title: Early metformin therapy to delay menarche and augment height in girls with precocious pubarche.
results.text_hl: Early @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy to delay menarche and augment height in @SPECIES_9606 @@@girls@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlexia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565500 @@@precocious pubarche@@@.

results.title: Pubertal metformin therapy to reduce total, visceral, and hepatic adiposity.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: In LBW @SPECIES_9606 @@@girls@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlexia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565500 @@@PP@@@, pubertal @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy was followed by a favorable adipokine profile and by a reduction of total, visceral@DISEASE_Neoplasms_Adipose_Tissue @DISEASE_MESH:D018205 @@@, and hepatic adiposity@@@ beyond puberty.

citations.NLM: Ibáñez L, Lopez-Bermejo A, Diaz M, Marcos MV, de Zegher F. Pubertal metformin therapy to reduce total, visceral, and hepatic adiposity. J Pediatr. 2010 Jan;156(1):98-102.e1. PMID: 19772969

results.title: Metformin treatment for four years to reduce total and visceral fat in low birth weight girls with precocious pubarche.

results.title: Neutrophil count in small-for-gestational age children: contrasting effects of metformin and growth hormone therapy.
results.text_hl: In SGA @SPECIES_9606 @@@girls@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlexia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565500 @@@PP@@@, the present results corroborate the antiinflammatory benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Ibáñez L, Fucci A, Valls C, Ong K, Dunger D, de Zegher F. Neutrophil count in small-for-gestational age children: contrasting effects of metformin and growth hormone therapy. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2005 Jun;90(6):3435-9. PMID: 15755850

results.title: Metformin for Rapidly Maturing Girls with Central Adiposity: Less Liver Fat and Slower Bone Maturation.
results.text_hl: A pilot study suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment for 4 years reduces central @DISEASE_Neoplasms_Adipose_Tissue @DISEASE_MESH:D018205 @@@adiposity@@@ in @DISEASE_Birth_Weight @DISEASE_MESH:D001724 @@@LBW@@@-@<m>DISEASE_Hyperlexia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565500 @@@PP@@@ girls and normalizes puberty and adult height.

citations.NLM: de Zegher F, García Beltrán C, López-Bermejo A, Ibáñez L. Metformin for Rapidly Maturing Girls with Central Adiposity: Less Liver Fat and Slower Bone Maturation. Horm Res Paediatr. 2018;89(2):136-140. PMID: 29131093

results.title: Insulin sensitization for girls with precocious pubarche and with risk for polycystic ovary syndrome: effects of prepubertal initiation and postpubertal discontinuation of metformin treatment.

results.title: Sensitization to insulin in adolescent girls to normalize hirsutism, hyperandrogenism, oligomenorrhea, dyslipidemia, and hyperinsulinism after precocious pubarche.
results.text_hl: Before the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ trial, longitudinal studies in these girls had shown that @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinism@@@ was present at prepubertal diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlexia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565500 @@@precocious pubarche@@@, and that it increased markedly in late puberty or early postmenarche.

citations.NLM: Ibáñez L, Valls C, Potau N, Marcos MV, de Zegher F. Sensitization to insulin in adolescent girls to normalize hirsutism, hyperandrogenism, oligomenorrhea, dyslipidemia, and hyperinsulinism after precocious pubarche. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2000 Oct;85(10):3526-30. PMID: 11061495

results.title: Insulin sensitization early after menarche prevents progression from precocious pubarche to polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@ sensitization early after menarche prevents progression from @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlexia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565500 @@@precocious pubarche@@@ to @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Ibáñez L, Ferrer A, Ong K, Amin R, Dunger D, de Zegher F. Insulin sensitization early after menarche prevents progression from precocious pubarche to polycystic ovary syndrome. J Pediatr. 2004 Jan;144(1):23-9. PMID: 14722514
